android.car.navigation

类 CarNavigationStatusManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.navigation.CarNavigationStatusManager

  • public final class CarNavigationStatusManager
extends CarManagerBase
    API for providing navigation status for instrument cluster.

    • 字段概要

      • sendEvent

        @Deprecated
public void sendEvent(int eventType,
                                   Bundle bundle)
        已过时。 use #sendEvent(Bundle) instead.
        Sends events from navigation app to instrument cluster.

      • sendNavigationStateChange

        public void sendNavigationStateChange(Bundle bundle)
        Sends events from navigation app to instrument cluster.
        参数:
        bundle - object holding data about the navigation event. This information is generated using androidx.car.cluster.navigation.NavigationState#toParcelable()
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the client is not holding CarAppFocusManager.APP_FOCUS_TYPE_NAVIGATION focus.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if bundle is null, if it cannot be parsed or if the android.car.cluster.navigation.NavigationState.NavigationStateProto generated after parsing is not valid. This object is not valid if it contains a android.car.cluster.navigation.NavigationState.Maneuver where Maneuver#typeV2 is populated but Maneuver#type is not.

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • getInstrumentClusterInfo

        public CarNavigationInstrumentCluster getInstrumentClusterInfo()
        Returns navigation features of instrument cluster
